```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(flextable)
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
library(kableExtra)

data <- read_excel("data/Revidert_resultatskjema.xlsx", na = "NA") #Henter data

enring_kontroll <- data %>%
select(id, time, group, vo2max_ml_min_kg_6x5,vo2max_ml_min_6x5, weight, o2_puls_ml, hf_max, rer_max_30sek, bfmax_30sek, Ve_L_min_max_30sek,time_to_exhaustion, borg_end,lac, time_to_exhaustion,`arbec_%_maksHF`,`arbec_%_o2max`,arbec_mean_o2,arbec_vo2_ml_min, arbec_RER, arbec_HF, arbec_ve_l_min, arbec_vco2_ml_min, lean_mass, fat_mass, one_rm_newton, one_rm_watt,pmax_left, pmax_right, fmax_left, fmax_right) %>%
filter(group != "fls") %>%
  filter(id != "tr031 10541") %>%
  filter(id != "tr031 11421") %>%
  filter(id != "tr031 13404") 
 
  
endring_kon <- enring_kontroll %>%
  group_by(time,group) %>%
   pivot_longer(names_to = "variable", 
               values_to = "value", 
               cols = vo2max_ml_min_kg_6x5:fmax_right) %>%
  filter(value != "na") %>%
   pivot_wider(names_from = "time",
              values_from = "value")%>%
  filter(pre != "na") %>%
  filter(post != "na") %>%
  mutate(diff = post/pre*100-100) %>%
  group_by(group, variable) %>% #legger til variabel i gruppe
summarise(m = mean(diff)) %>%
  print()
```

flextable::save_as_docx(path = "Test.docx") #brukes til å lagre til word
